title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 15 cm [6"]  Cut top and bottom.

    Weft: 23.5 cm [9"] Selvedge left side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott

a. pink/tan ground with gold color arabesque motif with flowers and ribbons
b. the same as "a"
